lessons.name: Choosing good lumber
lessons.markdown: Buy the straightest 2x4s you can find. Take your time picking through the pile. It'll save you time later!

lessons.name: Which tools to buy
lessons.markdown:
* Table saw
* Impact driver
* Circular saw
* Miter saw

lessons.name: Safety
lessons.markdown: The secret to safe woodworking is to make sure to keep your hands out of the-- MICROJIG[!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mvO6zaIUO18)

lessons.name: How to use a miter saw
lessons.markdown:
1. Place the wood.
2. Clamp it down.
3. Turn on the saw and cut it.

lessons.name: First project: basic workbench
lessons.markdown:
1. Cut some pieces of wood.
2. Glue a few of them togeher.
3. Make the rest of the workbench.

![](https://daveceddia.com/images/amazing-workbench.jpg)
